Please note, PerformHR will be closed on the public holidays over Christmas,

​For urgent matters please call your allocated support or 1300 406 005.

Hi Montana,

Sure, confirming we have updated the text as well.

Thanks so much Joel.

Sorry just realised its also the body copy!! See below if you wouldn't mind updating too.
